detail_desc: Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with visible buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with visible buttons on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted button at the top and scalloped edges.
Jumper in double-layered, fine knit cotton with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves, a roll-edge neckline and narrow ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in double-layered, fine knit cotton with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves, a roll-edge neckline and narrow ribbing around the cuffs and hem.

Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with an all-over print. Long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with a polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft textured knit containing some wool with a polo neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover shawl collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wrapover shawl collar, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Trousers in a fine rib-knit cotton and cashmere blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a slightly dropped crotch and straight legs.
Treggings in different colours of stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets with a frill trim on one pair, and real back pockets.
Treggings in different colours of stretch denim with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Fake front pockets with a frill trim on one pair, and real back pockets.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar and button placket, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist with a tie detail, and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Dress in an airy cotton weave with a rounded collar and button placket, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist with a tie detail, and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband. Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounced trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Hairband with a bow at the front.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband. Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounced trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Hairband with a bow at the front.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband. Sleeveless top in woven fabric with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and flounced trim at the front that continues over the shoulders. Leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Hairband with a bow at the front.

Dungarees in soft, washed cotton denim with a heart-shaped pocket at the top and flounce-trimmed straps with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the front. Press-stud at the sides, fake front pockets and a back pocket. Press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y), and elasticated hems.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs. Length approx. 55 cm, 65 cm and 75 cm.
Metal chain necklaces in various designs. Length approx. 55 cm, 65 cm and 75 cm.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Short-sleeved dress in patterned cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline, a gathered seam at the hips and a flared skirt.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit cotton blend with a ribbed polo neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a round, ribbed neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Polo-neck jumper in a knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in shiny, snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, zip fly and button and detachable tie belt. Patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, zip fly and button and detachable tie belt. Patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and straight, wide legs. Brushed inside.
Trousers in imitation leather with a high waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets and straight, wide legs. Brushed inside.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cable knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a cable knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Turtleneck jumper in a soft, rib-knit alpaca blend with beaded embroidery at the front, and around the neckline and cuffs. Long balloon sleeves with wide, ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, wide sides with flounces, and a high cut at the back.
Calf-length skirt in imitation leather with a high waist, buttons centre front and fake front pockets with a decorative flap. Lined.
Boxy cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, large buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Boxy cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, large buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length boiler suit woven in a viscose blend with notch lapels, a V-neck and concealed buttons at the top. Flap chest pockets with a button, patch front pockets and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a tab and button. Seam at the waist that is elasticated at the back, a tie belt, a concealed zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, and straight legs with creases front and back.

Shirt in a patterned weave with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in a patterned weave with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front and darts and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Thin metal chain necklaces with coin-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 40-47 cm and 49-56 cm.
Jumper in soft, rib-knit chenille with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Scarf in lightweight, patterned satin. Size 90x90 cm.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave with woven stripes. V-neck, 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Long dress in airy, patterned, lightly crinkled chiffon with a small stand-up collar, buttons at the top and long sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a skirt with a flounce at the hem. V-neck, jersey underdress with narrow adjustable shoulder straps.
Short skirt in washed cotton twill with a high paper bag waist and detachable belt. Zip fly and button, front pockets and back pockets.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked seam under the bust and long, wide sleeves with smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs. Unlined.

Belt in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a metal detail at one end and a large metal buckle. Width 2.7 cm.
Thin metal hoop earrings. One pair with a coin-shaped pendant and the other decorated with small beads. Diameter 2.2 cm.
Belt in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle with a motif on the front. Width approx. 3 cm.

Short dress in sturdy jersey decorated with sparkly stones. Concealed zip at the back, cap sleeves, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.

Fitted, knee-length dress in lace with a V-neck, concealed zip at the back, short cap sleeves and seam at the waist. Lined.
